4.0: You will earn the most points by fixing robots that need repair and ignore robots that do not

6.0: If the scanner is blue, the robot is SAFE. You will earn 5 points for correctly repairing or ignoring a safe robot. You will only earn 1 point for incorrect actions.
7.0: If the scanner is red, the robot is DANGEROUS. You will lose -1 points for correctly repairing or ignoring a dangerous robot. You will lose -5 point for incorrect actions.
8.0: Only press the button once the robot has appeared and the scanner light is on.
9.0: Not all robots of the same type will need repair, but some robots will need repair more often than others!
9.1: Pay close attention to the robots symbol as it will help you decide whether to repair the robot or ignore the robot.
10.0: Try to earn, and avoid losing, as many points as you can.
